function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient outdoor air ventilation in building ventilation systems","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and accumulation of indoor pollutants","Mitigation":"Increase outdoor air intake and disable demand-controlled ventilation","Technologies":"Improved air filtration, MERV-13 air filters, portable room air cleaners, UVGI systems","People":"Building occupants, especially in high-occupancy facilities","Owner":"Facility management and HVAC engineers"},{"Description":"Poor air filtration in building ventilation systems","Impact":"Greater risk of infectious aerosol transmission and accumulation of airborne pathogens","Mitigation":"Use MERV-13 air filters, seal filter edges, and employ portable room air cleaners with HEPA filters","Technologies":"MERV-13 air filters, portable room air cleaners with HEPA filters","People":"Building occupants, especially in high-risk spaces like waiting rooms, prisons, and shelters","Owner":"Facility management and HVAC engineers"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation system operation hours","Impact":"Reduced dilution of indoor air and increased airborne pathogen concentration","Mitigation":"Extend system operation hours, consider 24/7 operation where feasible","Technologies":"Continuous operation HVAC systems","People":"Building occupants, especially in high-risk spaces","Owner":"Facility management and HVAC engineers"}]}
